item.title: IE8 BETA1 来了....
item.description: 太疯狂了，迅雷30秒就下完了14.43M啊 Install Internet Explorer 8 Internet Explorer 8 can be installed on Microsoft Windows Vista® Service Pack 1 (SP1), Windows Vista, Windows XP® Service Pack 2 (SP2), Windows Server® 2008 and Windows Server2003 Service Pack 2 (SP2). Downloads are available from the following locations: Internet Explorer 8 Beta 1 for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008 Internet Explorer 8 Beta 1 for Windows Vista x64 Edition and Windows Server 2008 x64 Edition
